docs.snippet: The Washington Redskins defended the team’s name in a letter to the Senate majority leader, Harry Reid of Nevada, two days after 50 Democratic senators urged Roger Goodell, the N.F.L.’s commissioner, to support a change....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Washington Redskins defended the team’s name in a letter to the Senate majority leader, Harry Reid of Nevada, two days after 50 Democratic senators urged Roger Goodell, the N.F.L.’s commissioner, to support a change.
docs.abstract: Washington Redskins defend team's name in letter to Senate majority leader Harry Reid of Nevada; move comes two days after 50 Democratic senators urged NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell to support a name change; other football news noted.

docs.snippet: Redskins President Bruce Allen said in a letter to Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid on Saturday that the football team's nickname is "respectful" toward Native Americans....
docs.lead_paragraph: Redskins President Bruce Allen said in a letter to Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid on Saturday that the football team's nickname is "respectful" toward Native Americans.

headline.main: Redskins to Senators: Team's Name Is 'Respectful'
headline.print_headline: Redskins to Senators: Team's Name Is 'Respectful'

docs.snippet: The superintendent of the Steubenville school district where two high school football players were convicted of rape last year wiped computer hard drives, erased emails and lied to investigators about his knowledge of the case, newly released cour...
docs.lead_paragraph: The superintendent of the Steubenville school district where two high school football players were convicted of rape last year wiped computer hard drives, erased emails and lied to investigators about his knowledge of the case, newly released court documents say.
docs.abstract: Court documents indicate that Michael McVey, superintendent of Steubenville, Ohio, school district where two high school football players were convicted of rape in 2013, wiped computer hard drives, erased emails and lied to investigators about his knowledge of case; is charged with tampering with evidence and obstruction of justice.

headline.main: Ohio: School Official Is Accused of Destroying Rape Case Evidence
headline.print_headline: Ohio: School Official Is Accused of Destroying Rape Case Evidence

docs.snippet: A suicide bombing on Saturday that was meant to target an open air viewing of a football match in the central Nigerian city of Jos blew up early before reaching its target, killing three people, a witness told Reuters....
docs.lead_paragraph: A suicide bombing on Saturday that was meant to target an open air viewing of a football match in the central Nigerian city of Jos blew up early before reaching its target, killing three people, a witness told Reuters.

headline.main: Suicide Bombing in Nigeria's Jos Kills Three
headline.print_headline: Suicide Bombing in Nigeria's Jos Kills Three

docs.snippet: Australia forward Tim Cahill will lead the Socceroos in Monday's World Cup warmup against South Africa in Sydney, with recently named captain Mile Jedinak still recovering from injury, the team said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australia forward Tim Cahill will lead the Socceroos in Monday's World Cup warmup against South Africa in Sydney, with recently named captain Mile Jedinak still recovering from injury, the team said on Sunday.
